name: Growy Gal
description:
Help Patricia grow to gather all the stars, see how high a score you can get! Made for Kenney Jam 2022

Use A or D (or arrow keys) to move, and press W (or up arrow) to grow to new heights.  Watch your stamina though or you may get hit!  Her flower petals will fall out, and if they are all gone it is game over!

Credits
  • Assets by Kenney
  • Music by Retro Indie Josh
  • Programmed by thelethalkind

Special thanks to Spen @CitrusDreams for guiding me on my first solo dev game jam project!
Also thank you to Stewart for support and concept!
